title: In what way can doing philosophy obtain a broad perspective in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Philosophy is the love of knowledge and the search for ultimate truths. Developing your own philosophy of life can help you determine your values. And thisknowledge will help you in the way you conduct your life I will give you a worldview and and ethical compass in your life decisions.
Philosophy is about making simple things confusing and confusing things more confusing. No broad perspectives can ever come out if it!
